projects.title: Food(Back-end)
projects.description: API developed to manage information about dishes, users, and sessions. It provides basic Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations for entities such as dishes and users. Additionally, it includes user authentication and access control for specific operations.

projects.title: Movies(Back-end)
projects.description: A platform for managing notes and information about movies! This API allows users to store titles, ratings, and notes associated with movies they have watched.

projects.title: Notes(Front-end)
projects.description: It is an application designed to simplify the process of saving and managing useful links. Its frontend was developed using React, providing an interactive and responsive experience for users.
